Science Illustrations

All SciArt here depicts the New Mexico Elevation Gradient (PI: Dr. Marcy Litvak), a network of eddy covariance flux tower sites that span an elevation and aridity gradient of ecosystem types common in the US Southwest.



This project is maintained by egreich
